website_summaries.verdict: A somewhat smaller rebar cutter from Hitachi, a reputable manufacturer. It is stable and bends at a variety of angles
pros: Has an 8-amp motor with variable speed trigger
Includes lock for precise bending control
Mount it to a stable surface if you so choose

customer_reviews.title: Gift for the wife
customer_reviews.text: My wife and I are in the process of building our home and I bought this so she could help with the rebar. Honestly great product, easy to use and effective. Cost is high but it cuts and bends something that my 12in demo-saw doesn’t do. AND there isn’t a fear of sparks starting a fire. I was able to cut and bend 256 48”x12” #4 dowels in 2hrs using this tool. Ya it costs too much money but with the lack of available labor its worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Joe

customer_reviews.title: Cool tool
customer_reviews.text: very cool tool , not cheap but so much easier than the manual bar cuter-bender especially with # 5 bar
customer_reviews.author: PETER KYLE

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Operation
customer_reviews.text: Felt a bit too bulky at first but after using the product, the weight was no longer an issue after its performance worked exactly as needed. Functions perfectly and is durable for all rebar bending and cutting uses. Highly recommended!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: A bit expensive but worth it if you're bending rebar all the time!
customer_reviews.author: Jeff Milligan

customer_reviews.title: Product As specified
customer_reviews.text: Need to use longer for durability but so far so good
customer_reviews.author: Hansen Bay

customer_reviews.title: I'd give it 10 stars !!!!!! GREAT MACHINE
customer_reviews.text: If you work with rebar up to #5 grade 60 this is a great tool. I work with tons of rebar on every job. The price is definetly worth it. pays for itself in labor.....quickly. Cuts quick and does precise preset or custom bends. has no problem doing #5. Well egineered and a joy to use. easy to carry around. HITACHI really thought this one out. I can't see anything that would make it better.
customer_reviews.author: R. van der Bol-Costa

customer_reviews.title: The bender is very good
customer_reviews.text: I like the bender but the cutting is not very good
customer_reviews.author: A H

customer_reviews.title: Must have for concrete workers
customer_reviews.text: This machine has transformed my company's efficiency and productivity. Not sure how I ever got by without one.
customer_reviews.author: Somrak

customer_reviews.title: Can’t live with out it
customer_reviews.text: Don’t know why we didn’t buy this sooner. Definitely recommend
customer_reviews.author: Amy & Bobby Van Atta

customer_reviews.title: This was a great Christmas present!
customer_reviews.text: I got this for my husband as a Christmas gift because he is a metal artist who uses rebar frequently in his creations. I was amazed to see how quickly and easily this machine shapes and cuts 1/2 inch rebar. It is perfect for getting precise bends with no physical effort and is easy to use. My husband has told everyone about the wonderful Christmas gift I gave him this year. He says he highly recommends this machine.
customer_reviews.author: Sheri

customer_reviews.title: Awesome tool!
customer_reviews.text: I am a commercial user and this is a great cutter/bender. It is quick and easy to use and will pay for itself in time saved!!
customer_reviews.author: Scott M

customer_reviews.title: Good Tool
customer_reviews.text: I use this tool on a regular basis. Works well. Looks to be a decent build. No signs of failure yet. Work mostly with number three and number four Rebar. Handles it with ease. Wish it was a little less expensive.
customer_reviews.author: Meaty

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great product, have purchased one for all of our crews
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Machine
customer_reviews.text: Great Machine. Cuts 5/8 Rebar with no problem. Bends 5/8" with absolutely no problems. Wish I had it a long time ago.
customer_reviews.author: Dennis A. Moore

customer_reviews.title: Perfect tool for complex components
customer_reviews.text: This tool is very easy to use, easily cuts and bends sched. 60 #5 bars. Perfect for forming variable configured pieces on site. I feel like it paid for itself in the first couple of days of use.
customer_reviews.author: Demetrius Barmettler

customer_reviews.title: Nice for small contractors
customer_reviews.text: Great machine works excellent, bends and cuts, easy to learn, don't hesitate if you need to cut or bend rebar.
customer_reviews.author: Roger R.

customer_reviews.title: The machine does what it says it would
customer_reviews.text: the Hitachi rebar bender does what we bought it for and therefore I am very satisfied. I usually expect A little oversell but so far it performs as advertized
customer_reviews.author: gunter

customer_reviews.title: Hitachi VB16Y Portable Rebar Bending and Cutting Machine
customer_reviews.text: The rebar bender works great. It helps make the job go faster, a time saver and easy on the body. Should have bought it along time ago.
customer_reviews.author: Clarice Wilde

customer_reviews.title: not strong enough
customer_reviews.text: when cutting rebar makes a weird sound and smells like burnt
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: My Wife is Excited About This Tool
customer_reviews.text: The VB16Y is a remarkable tool. I'm building my own home and there are few significant tasks I can get a 5 ft. tall 105 lb. wife to do. But with the VB16Y I can set up an assembly line and my wife now cuts and bends rebar. It's really that simple. The tool is light enough (around 45 lb.) I can bring it down to the job site. It's bends are repeatable and the tool is remarkably rugged. I bought mine used for our construction but if you are in the business you need this tool and I wouldn't be scared off by the price.
customer_reviews.author: Randall R. Anderson

customer_reviews.title: This thing is flat out amazing. There's nothing else this portable and this durable
customer_reviews.text: This thing is flat out amazing. There's nothing else this portable and this durable. I had one of these on a job site and bent and cut around 6k #4 rebars, the cutter was still going strong and the bending was bending effortlessly. I hate using the phrase paying for itself, but this tool paid for itself less than half way through my first use.
customer_reviews.author: W. Tam

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality
customer_reviews.text: This was a great machine for a week. I currently have 3 of them and none are in service. So for those bragging this machine must only use them occasionally. Its not for everyday steel workers
customer_reviews.author: Jeffrey Butler

customer_reviews.title: Automatic,........ Yeeeeha!
customer_reviews.text: This is the iphone of rebar bending tools. Automatic systematic, user friendly, effective. If you find a better rebar bender and cutter in a single package, buy it. This tool makes cutting and bending rebar effortless.
customer_reviews.author: jon k. yamada

customer_reviews.title: Rebar Bender and Cutter to Die for
customer_reviews.text: This is truly a gift to anyone involved in bending and cutting. One of my helpers wants to own one before he dies! This is the mans life wish to own one. I bought the VB 16 Y when it first came out and never once thought about the price once I started turning out consistent bends in 3 seconds.You can cut a ton of steel w/o breaking a sweat! This machine is durable, strong, and reliable. I hope you also get the chance to "play" with one some day.
customer_reviews.author: Bruce Williamson

customer_reviews.title: New innovation
customer_reviews.text: This awesome machine caught my eye at a tool show in Hawaii.. I was amazed at how portable and versatile it was. What made me buy it was its ability to cut up to #5 rebar and custom bend stirrups and angles, ... ALOHA
customer_reviews.author: ken ancheta

product_meta.title: Hitachi VB16Y Portable Variable Speed Rebar Cutter Bender, Up to Number 5 (3/8", 1/2", 5/8") Grade 60 Rebar, 3.1 Second Cut, 8.0 Amp (Discontinued by the Manufacturer)
product_meta.description:
Style:Hitachi VB16YHitachi's VB16Y Portable Rebar Cutter and Bender offers jobsite simplicity, precision, and portability promising to dramatically reduce the cost of on-site rebar installation. Unlike other machines on the market, the VB16Y can both bend and cut rebar and is easily transportable.

FROM THE MANUFACTURER
The Hitachi VB16Y 8-Amp Portable Rebar and Bender is a must have for the professional concrete installers. This 3-amp tool can bend and cut up to 5/8-inch rebar (at a maximum angle of 180-degrees) with amazing ease. The variable speed trigger allows for uniform bending and slow speed operation. The reference marking on its bending plate provide easy position adjustment. Also, precision angle bends are preset and can be finished in just seconds. This bender weighs 39.7 pounds and has an extremely low profile to facilitate maneuverability and ease of use. This tool can be mounted or carried to any location. The Hitachi VB16Y 8-Amp Portable Rebar and Bender comes with a 5-year limited warranty. Hitachi Power Tools provides professional-grade power tools for a variety of applications, including woodwork, metalwork, concrete, drilling, cutting and fastening. Since its inception, Hitachi has pioneered innovative technologies that have improved the quality of craftsmanship worldwide. Hitachi is a leader in power tool research and development and has achieved many firsts in the power tool industry. Today, Hitachi continues the tradition of innovation and engineering with new features in addition to classic quality.
feature_bullets: Hitachi Power Tools has renamed to Metabo HPT. Same great tools, with only a new name.
8 Amp motor, intense power (530W) that it uniformly bends up to No. 5 (3/8", 1/2", 5/8") Grade 60 rebar at a maximum angle of 180 degrees
Variable speed trigger with safety lock provides manual-like precision and control over the bending speed
Reference markings on bending plate provide for easy position adjustment
Precision angle bends are preset and completed in just seconds (cut: 3.1 seconds, bend: 5.1 seconds) for consistency
With the turn of a pre-set dial, bends can be made in a variety of angles
Extremely low profile design (18.4"L x 8.5"H x 9.1"W), yet extremely stable
39.7 lbs, portable design facilitates maneuverability and ease of use
Extremely low profile design (18.4"L x 8.5"H x 9.1"W), yet extremely stable
39.7 lbs, portable design facilitates maneuverability and ease of use
